Package com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.domains

Variable domain classes and related helpers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayDiscreteDomain<Element>  
    ChainedJointDomainReindexer  
    ComplexDomain  
    DiscreteDomain
    Domain for discrete variables that can take on a values from a predefined finite set in a specified order.
    DiscreteIndicesIterator
    An iterator over any array of integer indices each with a specified bounds iterating over the index at position n before that at n+1.
    Domain
    Base class for variable domains, which specify a set of valid values for a variable type.
    DomainList<D extends Domain>
    An immutable ordered list of Domain.
    DoubleDiscreteDomain  
    DoubleRangeDomain
    A discrete domain defined by a range of doubles separated by a constant positive interval.
    EnumDomain<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>>  
    FiniteFieldDomain
    A finite field of characteristic 2 (GF(2^N)).
    FiniteFieldNumber
    An extension of Number that includes additional information needed to fully define arithmetic operations on a finite field of characteristic 2 (GF(2^N)).
    IntDiscreteDomain  
    IntDomain
    Non-discrete integral domain.
    IntRangeDomain
    A discrete domain defined by a range of integers separated by a constant positive interval.
    JointDiscreteDomain<Element>
    A discrete domain representing the Cartesian product of other discrete domains.
    JointDomainIndexConditioner  
    JointDomainIndexer
    Provides a representation and canonical indexing operations for an ordered list of DiscreteDomain for use in implementing discrete factor tables and messages.
    JointDomainIndexJoiner
    A JointDomainReindexer that supports the splitting/joining of adjacent subdomains.
    JointDomainIndexPermuter
    JointDomainReindexer implementation that permutes the domain order including added and removed domains in the permutation.
    JointDomainReindexer
    Supports conversion of indexes between two JointDomainIndexers.
    JointDomainReindexer.Indices
    A set of domain indexes sized appropriately for a single JointDomainReindexer.Indices.converter for use in conversion computation.
    LargeDirectedJointDomainIndexer  
    LargeJointDomainIndexer  
    ObjectDomain
    Domain of all Java objects.
    RealDomain  
    RealJointDomain  
    StandardJointDomainIndexer  
    TypedDiscreteDomain<Element>
